content.text: Laakteen was a planetoid in the Colonies region, located just off the Giju Run hyperlane. It was the home of Laakteen Depot, a one-time pirate base and later Rebel Alliance outpost during the Galactic Civil War. Laakteen Depot was destroyed by the Super Star Destroyer Executor during its maiden voyage.
